root.name: Lunar Flight
root.description: OverviewLunar Flight is an indie simulation game developed and published by Shovsoft for the PC platform.The player controls a craft based upon the NASA Apollo Lunar Module flying between four different landing platforms completing delivery and scanning missions to earn credits, buy upgrades, and advance through ranks. There are 12 different thrust combinations to direct the module in any direction. The game can be played using either a keyboard, joystick or controller. A combination of cameras, a map, a thrust chart, and a nav system help you travel between platforms without running out of fuel or crashing.PC System RequirementsPC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: 2.4 GHz or equivalent processorMemory: 2 GBHard Disk Space: 900 MBVideo Card: 500 MB Video RAM and at least Shader Model 2.0DirectX®: 9.0cSound: Windows compatible sound cardMac System RequirementsOS: 10.6 or laterProcessor: Intel OnlyMemory: 2 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 900 MBVideo Card: 500 MB Video RAM and at least Shader Model 2.0DirectX®: 9.0cSound: Any(according to steam)
